column4: using grep: how do i search for the presense of a particular string in a bunch of files (recursing into sub directories) and get a listing of which files (and which line in each file) matches that string
ok, but i want it to list file names and the text matched and the line number
It should return file names but probably not line numbers.
You could include -n for line numbers but I don't know if it's predictably accurate.  Worth a shot...
